verbs.description: [ARG1: It] [V: was] [ARG2: inevitable] : NBC News botched a report on Thursday , issuing a major correction to a story that initially claimed Trump lawyer Michael Cohen was wiretapped by federal investigators . President Donald Trump seized on that error Friday morning , blasting the network and its reporters ' sources . NBC News issued a full
